name: Underwater adventure (itch) (marinac05)
description:
You are at the bottom of the ocean, escape from the giant octopus that is chasing you and go to the surface.  Grab the coins along the way and get the key to escape. Have fun :)

Controls:

[Move left] Left arrow ←

[Move right] Right arrow →

[Jump] Upper arrow ↑

[Doble jump] Press two times the upper arrow ↑↑
